constituent: sultry, sun, day, someone, puppet, sooty, old man, sun2, day2
heisigStory: The key word refers to the heat of summer. Its elements: sun . . . puppet.
koohiiStory1: Ahh, a fine sultry day with my love doll under the hot sun. I think she´s getting a tan!
koohiiStory2: [from decamer0n] This is the kanji for atsui (暑い) as in hot. If you´ve ever been in Japan in the summer no doubt you have heard hoards of people bellowing "Atsui! Atsui!" Here you are laying with your love doll under the hot sun. Luckily the manufacturers were smart and when the doll got to hot it would bellow "Atsui! It´s so sultry!".
